title: Enchanting Emerald Kundan Haaram with Jhumka Accents
features: This statement Haaram seamlessly blends tradition with modern aesthetics. The intricately handcrafted Kundan setting showcases unparalleled craftsmanship, while the brilliant-cut diamonds add a touch of contemporary sparkle. The pendant features a traditional paisley motif flanked by delicate, diamond-studded Jhumka charms. Emerald cabochons, set in bezel settings, provide a captivating focal point. The necklace border is adorned with dangles which adds beauty to the piece.
colors: Predominantly gold with dazzling white diamonds and striking green emerald accents.
occasions: and significant family celebrations (Seemantham). Its modern touch also makes it suitable for upscale parties and formal events.
description: A testament to timeless Hyderabadi artistry. The exceptional Kundan work and the brilliance of the diamonds create a captivating allure. This Haaram is not only a beautiful piece of jewelry but also an investment in a timeless heirloom, embodying cultural richness and refined elegance.
